message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'org.apache.metron.parsers.BasicParser' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.stellar.common.utils.ConversionUtils'.
Abbreviation in name 'CSVParser' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'METHOD_DEF' should be separated from previous statement.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'}' at column 9 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'}' at column 11 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'}' at column 13 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
WhitespaceAround: 'catch' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'}' at column 7 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
